mapper.sql: from sales_order_info I join meta_data_business B on I.company_code = B.company_code join sales_order_product P on I.order_code = P.order_code left join meta_data_product M on M.product_code = P.product_code
group by I.order_code, B.name, I.order_date, I.request_date

select I.order_code, B.name AS company_name ,I.order_date, I.request_date
where I.sales_status = 'requested' and I.request_date = CURDATE()
order by I.request_date ASC
